overview: Erik Hagstrom is our Senior Vice President of Research and Development. Erik has 20 plus years of organizational leadership and technical experience in the medical device and pharmaceutical industry. He was formerly Sr. VP of Operations and Quality at Light Sciences Oncology, and VP Technology Group at Plexus Corporation / SeaMED. While at SeaMED, Erik was involved in the design and manufacture of over 30 medical devices spanning a broad clinical spectrum.
